import { useDate } from "../../context/date-context" import "./Navbar.css" export const Navbar = () => { const {dateDispatch,destination,isSearchModalOpen,checkOutDate,checkinDate} = useDate() const handleSearchClick = () =>{ dateDispatch({ type:"OPEN_SEARCH_MODAL", }) console.log("Srach bar clicked :",isSearchModalOpen); } return ( <>

TravApp

{destination || "Any Where"} {checkinDate && checkOutDate ? `${checkinDate.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{day :"numeric",month:"short"})} - ${checkOutDate.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{day :"numeric",month:"short"})}` : "Any Week"} Add Guests search
    menu person_2
) } export default Navbar;
